metadata.title: CVE-2018-12291 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The on_get_missing_events function in handlers/federation.py in MatrixSynapse before 0.31.1 has a security bug in the get_missing_eventsfederation API where event visibility rules were not applied correctly.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
